name: The Walking Dead: Episode 3 - Long Road Ahead
name_original: The Walking Dead: Episode 3 - Long Road Ahead
description:
The Walking Dead: Episode 3 - Long Road Ahead is an adventure game developed by Telltale Games. It was originally released in 2012. It was published by Telltale Games. Most rawgers rated the game as "Exceptional".
The Walking Dead: Episode 3 - Long Road Ahead is available on PC, PlayStation 3 and Android.
